casebody.data:
Timothy Allen WARD and Donnie H. Ward
v.
NEW HANOVER COUNTY. No. 127P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Kenneth Shanklin, Wilmington, for Timothy H. Ward and Donnie H. Ward. E. Holt Moore, III, Assistant County Attornewy, for New Hanover County.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 14th day of March 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
